content: To You, O , I will sing praises.
I will behave wisely  follow the way of integrity.
When will You come to me?
I will walk in my house in integrity  with a blameless heart.
I will set no worthless  wicked thing before my eyes.
I hate the practice of those who fall away [from the right path];
It will not grasp hold of me.
A perverse heart shall depart from me;
Whoever secretly slanders his neighbor, him I will silence;
The one who has a haughty look and a proud (arrogant) heart I will not tolerate.
